## Data Exploration and Summarizing in R

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
names(diamonds)

dim(diamonds)

summary(diamonds)

head(diamonds)

tail(diamonds)

skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggpairs(diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, 
                            y = price)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) + geom_histogram() + theme_minimal()
```
